patch.data: • Fixed a bug that was causing Amarynth to occasionally fire multiple instances of her abilities.

• Fixed a bug that was causing the visual effects for Captivate (Q) to extend past the first target struck.
  • Fixed a bug that was causing the King of Masks to occasionally fire multiple instances of his abilities.
  • Fixed a bug that was causing the Endless Delights (E) to not deal area of effect damage.
